00051 Client::Client(const String &install_dir, const String &config_file,
00052                uint32_t default_timeout_ms)
00053   : m_timeout_ms(default_timeout_ms), m_install_dir(install_dir) {
00054   ScopedRecLock lock(rec_mutex);
00055 
00056   if (!properties) {
00057     init_with_policy<DefaultCommPolicy>(0, 0);
00058     m_props = new Properties();
00059     m_props->load(config_file, file_desc());
00060   }
00061   initialize();
00062 }

00064 
00065 Client::Client(const String &install_dir, uint32_t default_timeout_ms)
00066   : m_timeout_ms(default_timeout_ms), m_install_dir(install_dir) {
00067   ScopedRecLock lock(rec_mutex);
00068 
00069   if (!properties)
00070     init_with_policy<DefaultCommPolicy>(0, 0);
00071 
00072   if (m_install_dir.empty())
00073     m_install_dir = System::install_dir;
00074 
00075   m_props = properties;
00076   initialize();
00077 }

00081 Client::~Client() {
00082   m_range_locator = 0;
00083   m_master_client = 0;
00084   m_app_queue = 0;
00085   m_hyperspace = 0;
00086   m_conn_manager = 0;

00091 void Client::create_table(const String &name, const String &schema) {
00092   int error;
00093 
00094   if ((error = m_master_client->create_table(name.c_str(), schema.c_str()))
00095       != Error::OK)
00096     HT_THROW_(error);
00097 }

00100 Table *Client::open_table(const String &name) {
00101   TableCache::iterator it = m_table_cache.find(name);
00102 
00103   if (it != m_table_cache.end()) {
00104     if (!it->second->not_found())
00105       return it->second.get();
00106 
00107     m_table_cache.erase(it);
00108   }
00109   Table *table = new Table(m_range_locator, m_conn_manager, m_hyperspace, name,
00110                            m_timeout_ms);
00111   m_table_cache.insert(make_pair(name, table));
00112   return table;
00113 }

00116 uint32_t Client::get_table_id(const String &name) {
00117   // TODO: issue 11
00118   String table_file("/hypertable/tables/"); table_file += name;
00119   DynamicBuffer value_buf(0);
00120   Hyperspace::HandleCallbackPtr null_handle_callback;
00121   uint64_t handle;
00122   uint32_t uval;
00123 
00124   handle = m_hyperspace->open(table_file, OPEN_FLAG_READ, null_handle_callback);
00125 
00126   // Get the 'table_id' attribute. TODO use attr_get_i32
00127   m_hyperspace->attr_get(handle, "table_id", value_buf);
00128 
00129   m_hyperspace->close(handle);
00130 
00131   uval = (uint32_t)atoi((const char *)value_buf.base);
00132 
00133   return uval;
00134 }

00137 String Client::get_schema(const String &name) {
00138   int error;
00139   String schema;
00140 
00141   if ((error = m_master_client->get_schema(name.c_str(), schema)) != Error::OK)
00142     HT_THROW_(error);
00143 
00144   return schema;
00145 }

00147 
00148 void Client::get_tables(std::vector<String> &tables) {
00149   uint64_t handle;
00150   HandleCallbackPtr null_handle_callback;
00151   std::vector<Hyperspace::DirEntry> listing;
00152 
00153   handle = m_hyperspace->open("/hypertable/tables", OPEN_FLAG_READ,
00154                               null_handle_callback);
00155 
00156   m_hyperspace->readdir(handle, listing);
00157 
00158   for (size_t i=0; i<listing.size(); i++) {
00159     if (!listing[i].is_dir)
00160       tables.push_back(listing[i].name);
00161   }
00162 
00163   m_hyperspace->close(handle);
00164 }

00166 
00167 void Client::drop_table(const String &name, bool if_exists) {
00168   int error;
00169 
00170   // remove it from cache
00171   TableCache::iterator it = m_table_cache.find(name);
00172 
00173   if (it != m_table_cache.end())
00174     m_table_cache.erase(it);
00175 
00176   if ((error = m_master_client->drop_table(name.c_str(), if_exists))
00177       != Error::OK)
00178     HT_THROW_(error);
00179 }

00182 void Client::shutdown() {
00183   int error;
00184 
00185   if ((error = m_master_client->shutdown()) != Error::OK)
00186     HT_THROW_(error);
00187 }

00196 
00197 void Client::initialize() {
00198   m_comm = Comm::instance();
00199   m_conn_manager = new ConnectionManager(m_comm);
00200 
00201   if (m_timeout_ms == 0)
00202     m_timeout_ms = m_props->get_i32("Hypertable.Client.Timeout");
00203 
00204   m_hyperspace = new Hyperspace::Session(m_comm, m_props);
00205 
00206   Timer timer(m_timeout_ms, true);
00207 
00208   while (!m_hyperspace->wait_for_connection(3000)) {
00209     if (timer.expired())
00210       HT_THROW_(Error::CONNECT_ERROR_HYPERSPACE);
00211 
00212     cout << "Waiting for connection to Hyperspace..." << endl;
00213     poll(0, 0, System::rand32() % 5000);
00214   }
00215   m_app_queue = new ApplicationQueue(1);
00216   m_master_client = new MasterClient(m_conn_manager, m_hyperspace, m_timeout_ms,
00217                                      m_app_queue);
00218 
00219   if (m_master_client->initiate_connection(0) != Error::OK) {
00220     HT_ERROR("Unable to establish connection with Master, exiting...");
00221     exit(1);
00222   }
00223 
00224   m_range_locator = new RangeLocator(m_props, m_conn_manager, m_hyperspace,
00225                                      m_timeout_ms);
00226 }
